summary: A quirky take on life and relationships as it looks at a fairy tale with a bit of a squint and an endearing look at what being in love really means.
cast: Saif Ali Khan|Preity Zinta|Arshad Warsi|Javed Jaffrey|Jugal Hansraj|Tania Zaetta|Kunal Vijaykar|Ravi Khote|Kavita Kapoor|Maria Goretti|Siddhant Ashar|Zeke Zidaan|Azaan Ali Khan|Padam Bhushan|Bonnie Hill|Leima Popal|Nikita Bhatt|Deepak Shroff|Bidyut Dumra|Prakash Sawant|Rishi Oberoi|Ismail Shaikh|Darshan Aulakh|Yunus Hussain|Jezebel|Eknath Chalke|Akshai Puri|Suhail Farooqi|Danish Aslam|Siddharth Anand|Rashmi Kulkarni|Teisha Lowry|Jake Ryan|Damian Andrews|Abhishek Bachchan|Danielle Chau|Christina Collard|Nicola Preece|Tara Jade Ross
title: Salaam Namaste
